data.title: Drive thru is one of the best!
data.text: We were in a hurry and needed to eat breakfast before a meeting. Pulled through expecting a 10 minute wait or so, nope it was 3 minutes from the time they took the order to back on the road. The food was fresh, well assembled and the staff was friendly. A win for fast food!

data.title: Amazing team & so accommodating!
data.text: Gluten, grain and flour free. I wanted a burger BAD. Ordered a 1/3 # patty with extra cheese, mayo, lettuce, pickles and tomatoes. The cashier was rocking her job. Patient & understanding to my dietary needs. The bonus, it only cost me $2.85. I wish we had a Hardee's close to me...oh maybe not! Lol

data.title: Best of the WEST
data.text: Over past years I've frequented this business a lot.  I call in orders for many people & they prep & pack my food to travel.  Today it was breakfast,  as they have my favorite sausage biscuit.  The staff changed a couple of years ago, & at that time I considered this to be an EXCEPTIONAL. I miss the former, but the current management seem "eager to please."

data.title: Worth navigating a busy intersection.
data.text:
Hardee’s Red Burrito #1505447 2370 Russellville Road, Bowling Green, KY 42101 270-842-4380
Hours: Mon-Thurs 5am-10pm, Fri-Sat 5am-11pm, Sun 6am-10pm for inside and drive up. 
SERVICE: Excellent to average. Accuracy of order seems to be employee specific. Some are more diligent.  If you’re lucky to get Donna, she is friendly, informative, efficient, accurate, and helpful.  FOOD: Very good. Fresh, fast. Biscuits we consider the best anywhere. We'll drive extra miles to track down Hardee's biscuits.  Food is good, usual items.  Red Burrito items available at 10:30am.  ATMOSPHERE: Very good. Clean, organized.  VALUE: Excellent. Coupons in local newspaper increase already good value.  OVERALL: Chain-Fast Food. Very good. NOTE: The building is at the corner of two of the busiest streets.  Left turns during rush hour can be a challenge.

data.title: Overcooked and burnt
data.text: Ate here twice bc it was close by to where we were staying. First time I grabbed some battered chicken strips. They were burnt and cold. Second time a bacon egg cheese biscuit--cold and soggy. Never again. I miss having a local Hardee's.

data.title: Very good service
data.text: Good burger, great service. Place was clean. Maybe the best Hardee's I have ever been to..so wish they would open one up in the Boston area.

data.title: Nice folk food is good for fast food
data.text: We were on the road and needed a quick breakfast.  The lady who rested on us made our visit a great one.  The food was just normal but hey sometimes attitude will flavor the food as well

data.title: Great place for a Burger!!!
data.text: Wow! Ordered at 10;00 p.m. and service was excellent and food fresh and ordered the way I wanted it!! Thank you for taking the time so late to make my meal a good one!!
